frames.title: BancoEstado Audit
infoLines: ‚Ä¢ No password fields found on main page

personalities.neko: BancoEstado audited successfully, nyaa~! TLS 1.3 detected - EXCELLENT security!
personalities.mario: The audit completed in 27 seconds! A swift and elegant performance!
personalities.noel: Good SSL, missing X-Frame-Options. Not critical, but should be fixed. *notes*

frames.title: Vulnerability: X-Frame-Options
infoLines: BancoEstado main page does not include
could embed page in malicious iframe.

personalities.neko: Missing header detected, nyaa~! Clickjacking risk exists, desu! Should be fixed!
personalities.mario: Ah! A vulnerability discovered through our ethical performance!
personalities.noel: Medium severity. Not critical, but definitely should be patched. *marks report*

frames.title: Finding: Login Location
infoLines: Main page does not contain visible login
Users accustomed to multiple domains may
Clearly indicate official login portal URL
on main page. Educate users about the
